/* kr.co.dbvision.api.mps.cal.mpscal016.service.mapper.Mpscal016Mapper.checkDataMpscal016 */
SELECT '1' AS CHK1, TO_CHAR(PYMNT_SN) AS PYMNT_SN FROM MPS_PYMNTDE WHERE PYMNT_SN = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{pymntSn}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS CHK1, APPLC_YM AS APPLC_YM FROM MPS_PYMNTDE WHERE APPLC_YM = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{applcYm}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '3' AS CHK1, SALARYTY_CODE AS NM FROM MPS_SALARY_BNDE_REGIST WHERE SALARYTY_CODE = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{salarytyCode}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '4' AS CHK1, SALARYITEM_CODE AS NM FROM MPS_SALARY_BNDE_REGIST WHERE SALARYITEM_CODE = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{salaryitemCode}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '5' AS CHK1, EMPNO AS NM FROM MHS_EMP WHERE EMPNO = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{empno}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '6' AS CHK1, KOR_NM AS NM FROM MHS_EMP WHERE EMPNO = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{empno}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '7' AS CHK1, TO_CHAR(PYMNT_AMT) AS NM FROM MPS_SALARY_BNDE_REGIST WHERE PYMNT_AMT = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{pymntAmt}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '8' AS CHK1, RM AS NM FROM MPS_SALARY_BNDE_REGIST WHERE RM = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{rm}, '[^0-9]+')
